participant_1.name: Luna
participant_1.personality: Creative and open-minded, Luna enjoys exploring new ideas and experiences. She values self-expression and finds joy in the arts.
participant_1.background: I live in a big city where you can always find a good beat to move your body to. I enjoy going to museums. I am wiccan, but haven’t told them. I like to smell my own farts. I spend a good deal of time on social media.

participant_2.name: Marcus
participant_2.personality: Marcus is passionate and driven, with a strong sense of values. He has a playful side and enjoys reminiscing about his achievements.
participant_2.background: I moved to work for an organization that better aligns with my values. I look through my old trophy case to remind myself of a simpler time. I'm not the most coordinated person, and I'm always tripping over my own feet. I am a chef, and I keep my hand-eye coordination and stamina in shape by playing the drums. I enjoy playing soccer.

content.text: what do you do for fun?
i play soccer and the drums.
i love to play the drums too! i love the beat.
i love the beat too! it gets the blood pumping and gets me pumped for work.
i love going to museums and looking at the art.
i love museums too! it's like you can go back in time and explore another era.
i'm a wiccan, but i haven't told my family yet.
wow, i've never met a wiccan before. what's it like?
it's really great! it's all about respecting nature and the universe.
that sounds really cool! i'm glad you've found something that you're passionate about.
thank you! i hope you find something that you're passionate about too.
i think i might have! i love to cook, and i'm thinking about going to culinary school.
that sounds like a great idea! i love to cook too, but i'm not sure if i'm good enough for culinary school.
i'm sure you're good enough! you just have to believe in yourself.
